entry.title: avoidwork/woodland: Lightweight HTTP framework with automatic headers
entry.content: Lightweight HTTP framework with automatic headers

entry.title: stexcore/encrypted-middleware: @stexcore/encrypted-middleware is a lightweight and flexible Express.js middleware designed to handle encrypted HTTP requests. Seamlessly integrated with encrypted-fetch, this middleware supports hybrid encryption (RSA + AES), allowing secure transmission and decryption of sensitive data.
entry.content: @stexcore/encrypted-middleware is a lightweight and flexible Express.js middleware designed to handle encrypted HTTP requests. Seamlessly integrated with encrypted-fetch, this middleware supports hybrid encryption (RSA + AES), allowing secure transmission and decryption of sensitive data.

entry.title: nktnet1/rt-stack: Lightweight turborepo with modular components, shared configs, containerised deployments and 100% type-safety.
entry.content: Lightweight turborepo with modular components, shared configs, containerised deployments and 100% type-safety.

entry.title: stexcore/encrypted-fetch: encrypted-fetch is a lightweight HTTP client that ensures secure communication by encrypting headers, body, and paths. Designed for compatibility with @stexcore/encrypted-middleware, this library leverages hybrid encryption (RSA + AES) to seamlessly transmit encrypted data to servers using the middleware for decryption.
entry.content: encrypted-fetch is a lightweight HTTP client that ensures secure communication by encrypting headers, body, and paths. Designed for compatibility with @stexcore/encrypted-middleware, this library leverages hybrid encryption (RSA + AES) to seamlessly transmit encrypted data to servers using the middleware for decryption.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
